content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO

--Selecting data from a particular CSV file.
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--Selecting data from all the files under the subfolder month=1.
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--OR
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--get data from csv format files only
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--Select data from all the files under 2020
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--Select data from subfolders

SELECT 
    TOP 100 *
FROM 
OPENROWSET  (   
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) AS Result

--Select data from multiple CSV files
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-02.csv'),
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as Result
